title: What to do about my ELO/MMR
body: I am an above average League player, I have friends that I play with that are Gold Rank and I play just fine with them but my solo queue ranking is Bronze 3 and I think my MMR is even worse, currently I have 1177 wins vs 1188 loses to my account.  I think a lot of this comes from getting my friends into League, playing with them while they leveled their accounts and learned the game.  I don't like ranked because my wifi can be sketchy and I don't want to let down the team because of that, can I still improve my MMR and get away from the HORRIFIC players I see in normal draft games?

replies.body: Normals MMR is a seperate "ranking" from your Solo q and Flex Q MMR, the only way to really improve it would be hitting some nasty win streaks.
